locationSection.intro: Las Filipinas in Orihuela Costa is a vibrant residential enclave that perfectly blends coastal charm with modern convenience. Situated in the southern Costa Blanca, this area has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Spanish Mediterranean living without sacrificing access to essential services. The neighbourhood benefits from excellent infrastructure, with Hospital de Torrevieja just 15 minutes away and a comprehensive range of supermarkets including Mercadona, Consum, and Lidl within easy reach. The expatriate community here is remarkably diverse and well-established, with strong British, Scandinavian, and Dutch populations ensuring English is widely spoken throughout the area. Orihuela Costa is renowned for its golden beaches, world-class golf courses, and relaxed lifestyle, making it an ideal destination for those seeking both leisure and investment opportunities. The area's year-on-year property appreciation of 10% reflects growing demand and confidence in the market.
